type: Legendary Creature – Human Advisor Mercenary Lord
rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Cornering Offense[/i] – {B}, {T}: Until end of turn, other creatures you control gain deathtouch. Activate this ability only if Byleth is attacking.
[i]Strategic Deployment[/i] – {G}, {T}: Until end of turn, whenever one or more other creatures deal combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier creature token. Activate this ability only if Byleth is attacking.
[i]Tactical Advantage[/i] – {U}, {T}: Draw a card for each player that was dealt combat damage this turn. Activate this ability only if Byleth is attacking.
